meanings.definition: The action of renovating or improving something, especially a building.
meanings.sent1: The refurbishment of the old library transformed it into a modern community center.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in the refurbishment of their office space to create a more productive environment.
meanings.sent3: During the refurbishment of the house, they found a hidden treasure behind a wall!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a refurbishment, brightening up the room with new energy.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishment of the park brought new life to the neighborhood, attracting families and children.

meanings.definition: The process of cleaning, repairing, or restoring an item to good condition.
meanings.sent1: After the refurbishment, the antique clock looked as good as new.
meanings.sent2: The refurbishment of the vintage car took months of meticulous work.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishment of the old painting revealed vibrant colors hidden beneath the dirt.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a refurbishment, repairing broken spirits with care and compassion.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishment of the worn-out furniture breathed fresh life into the room, making it cozy and inviting.
